trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_SEQ_00<tab>Koana is nervously awaiting the call from Thancred.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_000_001<tab>Thancred must know <var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var> by now...
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_000_002<tab>You found her!?
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_100_002<tab>...Understood. Thank you.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_000_003<tab>I had but to invoke his name. Thancred followed the Hoobigo's boat to its destination, and confirmed that they are indeed holding my sister captive.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_000_004<tab>“They,” of course, being Bakool Ja Ja and his minions. I swear, I will make them regret this.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_000_005<tab>Lamaty'i is in Richleaf tunnels. The moment the harness is repaired, we strap in the punutiy and make our way back down Ihuykatumu!
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_000_010<tab>I am glad to see you unharmed, Lamaty'i.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_011<tab>Thanks again for coming to my rescue, Koana.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_012<tab>And all of you too.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_ALPHINAUD_000_013<tab>Bakool Ja Ja must be desperate indeed to resort to such aggressive tactics.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_014<tab>I shouldn't have been so careless. I underestimated him, and it cost me a keystone!
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_015<tab>Fonjeantaine upended his life so that I could accomplish the Moblin's feat. He believed in me─believed in my cause─and I've let him down!
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_A1_000_001<tab>The contest isn't over yet!
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_A1_000_002<tab>So we take back what was stolen!
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_A1_000_003<tab>We won't let Bakool Ja Ja get away with this.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_017<tab>You're right. It's not over till it's over!
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_018<tab>Yes... We'll do exactly that!
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_019<tab>You're godsdamned right about that!
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>The next time I meet that brute, I'll knock him straight on his scaly behind and take back my keystone!
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_THANCRED_000_021<tab>Speaking of vengeance, didn't Bakool Ja Ja curse some “useless Boonewa sycophant” when he caught sight of us?
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_000_022<tab>A reference to Sareel Ja, I would assume. He is devoted to our brother, and is the only Boonewa I know of participating in the rite of succession.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_000_023<tab>If Zoraal Ja was somehow involved in this...
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_000_024<tab>I will never forgive him for putting our sister in danger! He will have forfeited his right to be called brother!
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_000_025<tab>Ahem... Bakool Ja Ja should face punishment, of course, but so must the bandits who had the temerity to abduct Lamaty'i.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_000_026<tab>I shall request that Father send a contingent of Landsguard to enforce the law in this region.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_027<tab>I agree that measures need be taken to keep travelers safe.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_028<tab>But I wonder what pushed these people towards a life of banditry in the first place? If we dig deeper, we might find a way to improve things for everyone.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KOANA_000_029<tab>...'Tis something to think about. For now, however, the rite continues. I thank you all for your help.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>We should be moving on, as well. Are you feeling fit to travel, Wuk Lamat?
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_031<tab>You bet I am! Zoraal Ja's gained a good head start, and it's time we clawed back some lost ground!

TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_KRILE_000_040<tab>Koana is the picture of composure and rationality...except when it comes to matters concerning Wuk Lamat's safety. Far be it from me to fault a brother for being protective, but still.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_ERENVILLE_000_041<tab>The Wuk Lamat I once knew would have been inconsolable at the loss of a keystone.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_ERENVILLE_000_042<tab>This journey─and your companionship─is doing her a world of good.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_ALPHINAUD_000_043<tab>We'll need to take that keystone back from Bakool Ja Ja before we arrive at the city of gold. He will not relinquish it without a fight, though...
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_ALISAIE_000_044<tab>Though they share a single body, it's obvious Bakool Ja Ja has two minds when you see one head calming the other head down.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>His personalities are as distinct as two individuals could be.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_046<tab>I really am sorry this happened. From now on, I won't let my guard down around suspicious strangers.
TEXT_KINGMB109_04888_WUKLAMAT_000_047<tab>And again, I do appreciate you all coming to save me!
